e22-co2060-AI-Integrated-Ecommerce-Platf.title: AI Integrated Ecommerce Platform
e22-co2060-AI-Integrated-Ecommerce-Platf.description: This project proposes an intelligent e-commerce platform that dynamically identifies and promotes trending electronic products by analyzing real-time online data. The system integrates AI-based trend analysis with automated workflows to improve product visibility and reduce manual effort in content management and marketing.

e22-co2060-AI-Smart-Assistant.title: AI Smart Assistant
e22-co2060-AI-Smart-Assistant.description: AI-based Smart Assistant for screen reading, automation, and AI guidance | Team: SENTINALS | University of Peradeniya | 2YP Project

e22-co2060-Blood-Bank-management-System-.title: Blood Bank management System web app

e22-co2060-Crop-Yield-Optimization-and-I.title: Crop Yield Optimization and Intelligent Plant Disease Analysis
e22-co2060-Crop-Yield-Optimization-and-I.description: This project is an integrated agricultural solution and platform consisting of an agricultural subsidy management system based on crop yield and an AI-driven plant disease scanner.

e22-co2060-DMS.title: DMS
e22-co2060-DMS.description: A comprehensive Debate Management System (DMS) designed to streamline competition organization, scoring, and team management.

e22-co2060-MyStay-Boarding-Platform.title: MyStay Boarding Platform
e22-co2060-MyStay-Boarding-Platform.description: MyStay is a responsive boarding place finder system developed as a web application to connect landlords and tenants. The system supports listing management, location-based search, and secure user authentication while following modern UI/UX and software engineering best practices.

e22-co2060-NagroMS.title: NagroMS
e22-co2060-NagroMS.description: NagroMS is a vendor-free digital platform connecting Sri Lankan farmers with consumers, experts, and services, providing trading, guidance, and weather insights to improve profits and support sustainable agriculture.

e22-co2060-OrthoPAR-Web-Platform.title: OrthoPAR Web Platform
e22-co2060-OrthoPAR-Web-Platform.description: A clinician friendly web system for automated PAR Index calculation with integrated MLOps and secure patient data handling

e22-co2060-PERA-SAM.title: PERA SAM
e22-co2060-PERA-SAM.description: A ML-powered software solution developed to address societal needs through sound analysis. Developed by Team Invictus as the Second Year Project (2YP) for CO2060: Software System Design (Dept. of Computer Engineering, University of Peradeniya).

e22-co2060-Patient-Management-System.title: Patient Management System
e22-co2060-Patient-Management-System.description: A web-based Patient Management System built with React and Spring Boot to manage patient records, medical history, and appointments in a centralized, secure platform for healthcare facilities

e22-co2060-PearlPath.title: PearlPath
e22-co2060-PearlPath.description: A centralized platform connecting hotels across Sri Lanka. Users can search hotels, view locations on interactive maps, explore nearby attractions, book stays, and hire local tour guides. Built using React.js, Node.js/Django, MySQL/MongoDB, and Google Maps API.

e22-co2060-Project-KNOT.title: Project KNOT
e22-co2060-Project-KNOT.description: Project KNOT is a university resource and maintenance management system focused on lecture hall and lab booking. It helps manage club events, shared facilities, and campus issue reporting while improving scheduling, approvals, and maintenance tracking through a centralized platform.

e22-co2060-Real-Time-Public-Bus-Tracking.title: Real Time Public Bus Tracking System
e22-co2060-Real-Time-Public-Bus-Tracking.description: A mobile-based system that displays real-time public bus locations on a map. Users can search buses by route number to check whether a bus is near or far. The project aims to improve transparency and reduce uncertainty in public transportation.

e22-co2060-School-Van-Management-System.title: School Van Management System
e22-co2060-School-Van-Management-System.description: The School Van Management System is a management platform developed to streamline and organize school transportation services. It helps schools manage vans, drivers, routes, pickup/drop schedules, and student details in a structured and efficient way. The system reduces manual work, improves safety, and ensures reliable transportation for students.

e22-co2060-Syncro.title: Syncro
e22-co2060-Syncro.description: Syncro is a universal reverse-auction marketplace that connects buyers and sellers efficiently. Clients post structured requests, and verified sellers compete with transparent bids in real time. The platform supports dual-role users and focuses on smart matching, reduced search effort, and fair pricing.

e22-co2060-Tour-guide.title: Tour guide
e22-co2060-Tour-guide.description: The Travel Guide Web Application is a full-stack web platform that helps users discover destinations, attractions, and plan trips in one place. It targets tourists, students, and local travelers, delivering a usable and secure MVP as part of the CO2060 Software Engineering Project.

e22-co2060-Web_Based_PAR_Index_System.title: Web_Based_PAR_Index_System
e22-co2060-Web_Based_PAR_Index_System.description: The Peer Assessment Rating (PAR) Index quantifies malocclusion severity in orthodontics. This project develops a web-based software system that integrates machine-learning-based orthodontic landmark detection on 3D dental models to automate PAR Index computation, focusing on scalability, reliability, and clinical usability.

e22-co2060-gympappa-spooty-app.title: gympappa spooty app
e22-co2060-gympappa-spooty-app.description: GympAPPa Spooty App – A full-stack web platform for managing sports equipment, court availability, tournaments, and events at the University of Peradeniya.

e22-co2060-hydro-risk-management.title: hydro risk management
e22-co2060-hydro-risk-management.description: Integrated Hydrology Risk-Management System for the Mahaweli River basin. Features secure MQTT/HTTPS sensor ingestion, time-series storage, and a decision support dashboard. Includes APIs for AI water-level forecasting, real-time flood alerts, and automated reporting for disaster management.

e22-co2060-travel-plan-assistant.title: travel plan assistant
e22-co2060-travel-plan-assistant.description: The Travel Assistant is an all-in-one digital companion designed to streamline trip planning. Developed as a Software Systems Design Project, it integrates itinerary management, real-time budget tracking, and route optimization into a single interface to eliminate the need for multiple apps.
